text:
Primitive Social | Full Stack Engineer | Lubbock, TX | ONSITE, REMOTE | https://primitivesocial.com/

We are looking for an experienced Laravel / Vue developer to join our growing web team. Primitive Social prides itself on its collegiate atmosphere, interesting technical problems, and a 'can-do' attitude.

We support remote work, or you can join us in our office in Lubbock, Texas!

Email jerred _at_ primitivesocial (dot) com.
